article.title: Detection of Supermassive Black Holes in Two Virgo Ultracompact Dwarf Galaxies

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the red line in Figure 2 represent?
choices: The integrated spectra of the UCDs.
The residuals after subtracting the best kinematic fit from the observed spectra.
The best kinematic fit to the observed spectra.
The noise level in the observed spectra.

multiple_choice_question.text: What do the cyan lines in Figure 3 represent?
choices: The individual Sérsic components of the double Sérsic model fit.
The PSF-convolved double Sérsic model fit to the surface brightness profiles.
The residuals between the data and the convolved models.
The unconvolved double Sérsic reconstructed profile.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the parameter "n" represent in Table 2?
choices: The position angle of the Sérsic profile.
The Sérsic exponent, describing the curvature of the luminosity profile.
The effective radius of the Sérsic profile.
The total magnitude of the Sérsic profile.

multiple_choice_question.text: The formula  βz = (σχ/ση)^2 is used to describe what property?
choices: The mass-to-light ratio of the UCD.
The anisotropy of the stellar orbits in the UCD.
The mass of the central black hole in the UCD.
The inclination angle of the UCD.
